about_the_game:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Baroque -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Girl with a Pearl Earring / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Allegory of Faith / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Milkmaid / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Art of Painting / Johannes Vermeer
  • Supper at Emmaus / Caravaggio
  • The Surrender of Breda / Diego Velázquez
  • Abduction of Europa / Rembrandt van Rijn
  • The Storm on the Sea of Galilee / Rembrandt van Rijn
  • The Battle of the Amazons / Peter Paul Rubens
  • The Feast of Venus Verticordia / Peter Paul Rubens

Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Core2 duo or higer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM or higer
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
